metadata.synopsis: Lady Jannath's Chamberlain is in the process of firing a junior servant, Bailey. The servant knows to keep quiet. If the player does not interrupt the firing, then servant Bailey leaves for good.

2.speaker: Chamberlain Mercer
2.text: Pack your things! You're no longer a member of this staff.
2.context: NodeContext: Berating, but not raising his voice

0.speaker: Servant Bailey
0.text: I'm sorry, Mr Mercer. It was an accident!

3.speaker: Chamberlain Mercer
3.text: Lady Jannath tolerates many things, but your clumsiness... it is unacceptable.
3.context: NodeContext: Scolding, like this is the worst possible thing in the world. Not raising his voice.

1.speaker: Chamberlain Mercer
1.text: If you wish to treat this like an alehouse, then go and work in one!
1.context: NodeContext: Berating, but not raising his voice
